pet.name: Henny and Roo
pet.information: Spoil your flock and yourself! Henny and Roo is the first and only subscription box for backyard chicken enthusiasts.  Each month, you'll receive hard-to-find first aid and health products, chicken treats, and coop items for your chickens, and useful chicken-themed gifts for you.  A monthly subscription is $39.95 a month.  A three-month pre-paid subscription averages $38.98 a month, totaling $116.95, four times a year.  A six-month pre-paid subscription averages $37.99 a month, totaling $227.95, twice a year.  For more information, go to www.cratejoy.com.
pet.paragraph1: Spoil your flock and yourself! Henny and Roo is the first and only subscription box for backyard chicken enthusiasts.  Each month, you'll receive hard-to-find first aid and health products, chicken treats, and coop items for your chickens, and useful chicken-themed gifts for you.
pet.paragraph2:
Price List
Monthly: $39.95/month
3-Month: $38.98/month = $116.95 - 4 times a year
6-Month: $37.99/month = $227.95 - twice a year

box of the week.name: Decorated
box of the week.information: Every season, we send you a limited edition box that contains timeless, high-quality decor.  Subscribe quarterly or annually, and cancel anytime hassle-free.  A quarterly subscription is $79.99 a season.  An annual pre-paid subscription is $287.98.  For more information, go to decorated.com.
box of the week.paragraph1: Every season, we send you a limited edition box that contains timeless, high-quality decor.  Subscribe quarterly or annually, and cancel anytime hassle-free.

male-baby.name: My Busy Box Buddy
male-baby.information: My Busy Box Buddy provides children with productive, and fun activities, for them to explore, discover, imagine, create, and learn while engaging their minds and senses.  Each box contains 7 or more items each month.  One box every three months is $40 a box.  Two boxes over six months is $39.50 a box, totaling $79, twice a year.  Four boxes over twelve months is $38.75 a box, totaling $155, once a year.  For more information, go to www.cratejoy.com.
male-baby.paragraph1: My Busy Box Buddy provides children with productive, and fun activities, for them to explore, discover, imagine, create, and learn while engaging their minds and senses.  Each box contains 7 or more items each month.

1 Box Every 3 Months: $40/box
2 Boxes Over 6 Months: $39.50/box = $79 - twice a year
4 Boxes Over 12 Months: $38.75/box = $155 - once a year

male-child.name: Peas and Carrots Plant Based Food Club
male-child.information: A subscription box filled with fun, family-friendly recipes for meals, snacks, and desserts.  Each monthly box is filled with delicious recipes, fun-filled games, and crafts.  Cooking in the kitchen is a great way for kids to learn.  And the bonus is they love to eat all the food they make.  Our meals are plant-based, but anyone can use them!  A monthly subscription is $24.95 a month.  A six-month pre-paid subscription is $22.95 a month, totaling $137.70, twice a year.  An annual subscription is $19.99 a month, totaling $239.88, once a year.  For more information, go to www.cratejoy.com.

male-teen.name: House Plant Box
male-teen.information: House Plant Shop delivers a custom crafted collection of house plants and house plant products in a simple monthly package.  We use our large array of plants in our greenhouses to put together a uniquely themed box every month.  A monthly Plant Box is $12 a month.  A monthly Pet-Friendly House Plant Box is $12 a month.  A monthly Premium Plant Box is $30 a month.  A monthly Premium Pet-Friendly Plant Box is $30 a month.  A monthly Seasonal Garden Plant Box is $30 a month.  A monthly Pre-Potted Terra Cotta Plant Box is $35 a month.  For more information, go to www.houseplantbox.com.

male-adult.name: The Appalachian Mercantile
male-adult.information: The J.Q. Dickinson Appalachian Mercantile is a selection of the finest foods, crafts, and home goods shipped directly to you.  Each box contains 6 to 7 items, and includes a recipe as well as a card telling you about each maker.  A monthly subscription is $45 a month.  A three-month pre-paid subscription is $42 a month, totaling $126, four times a year.  A six-month pre-paid subscription is $40 a month, totaling $240, twice a year.  An annual subscription is $38 a month, totaling $456, once a year.  For more information, go to www.j q d appalachianmercantile.com.

female-baby.name: The Story Box
female-baby.information: The Story Box is a monthly delivery of children's books.  It's fun, exciting, and full of learning! Each package includes 2 children's books and a parent guide written by a speech-language pathologist.  Our boxes help you make the most of your family reading time.  A monthly subscription is $14.99 a month.  For more information, go to www.jointhestorybox.com.
female-baby.paragraph1: The Story Box is a monthly delivery of children's books.  It's fun, exciting, and full of learning! Each package includes 2 children's books and a parent guide written by a speech-language pathologist.  Our boxes help you make the most of your family reading time.

female-child.name: Loop Lab
female-child.information: Bring the science lab into the comfort of your own home! Loop Lab is a mind-blowing monthly science subscription box with a focus on fun, interactivity, and entertainment.  Created by the team at Mad Science, with over 35 years of experience creating educational and entertaining science programs for kids.  A monthly subscription is $29.99 a month.  For more information, go to www.shop.madscience.com.

Created by the team at Mad Science, with over 35 years of experience creating educational and entertaining science programs for kids.

female-teen.name: Bath Blessing Box
female-teen.information: Bath Blessing Box is calling all Bath and Shower Lovers! We're your premier Spa Subscription! Each month you'll receive artisan, natural, and essential oil-based bath and body products to transform your bath into a Sanctuary.  Relax, Rinse, and Repeat! A monthly subscription is $39.99 a month.  A three-month pre-paid subscription is $37.99 a month, totaling $113.97, four times a year.  For more information, go to www.bathblessing.com.

female-adult.name: Bath Bevy
female-adult.information: Bath Bevy is the subscription box for the bath and body lover.  Check out our new tubeless option! We deliver a carefully curated selection of homemade bath and body products from indie bath and body brands around a theme to your door every month.  A monthly subscription is $38.95 a month.  A three-month pre-paid subscription is $36.95 a month, totaling $110.95, four times a year.  A six-month pre-paid subscription is $35.95 a month, totaling $215.70, twice a year.  An annual pre-paid subscription is $34.95 a month, totaling $419.40, once a year.  For more information, go to www.bathbevy.com.

neutral-baby.name: Bookroo
neutral-baby.information: Bookroo is a monthly subscription for your kids that helps them fall in love with reading by combining the excitement of opening a gift with the discovery of new treasured books.  We send hidden gems your kids will LOVE, so you can build a home library of quality books stress-free!  A Bookroo Book box is $16.95 a month.  A Bookroo Chapter Book Box is $21.95 a month.  For more information, go to www.bookroo.com.

neutral-child.name: Backpack the World
neutral-child.information: Explore a new country every month with this exciting program.  Our kits, which include political, geographical, economic, cultural information, activities, and recipes from around the world for children ages 8 to 14.  A monthly subscription is $33.95 a month.  A three-month pre-paid subscription is $27.95 a month, totaling $83.85, four times a year.  A six-month pre-paid subscription is $26.95 a month, totaling $161.70, twice a year.  An annual subscription is $25.95 a month, totaling $311.40, once a year.  For more information, go to www.cratejoy.com.

neutral-teen.name: Match Made Coffee
neutral-teen.information: Each month, you'll receive a curated pairing of freshly roasted international craft coffee along with perfectly flavor-paired gourmet cookies, delivered to your doorstep.  Forget wine and cheese, indulge in or gift this unique coffee pairing experience, and enjoy your match made in heaven.  A monthly subscription is $19.95 a month.  For more information, go to www.matchmade coffee.com.

Forget wine and cheese, indulge in or gift this unique coffee pairing experience, and enjoy your match made in heaven.

neutral-adult.name: Habitation Box
neutral-adult.information: Want to walk into a home that feels clean, calm, and welcoming? That feeling starts with your decor.  Each month you receive on-trend items that freshen up your home for each season.  Both Habitation One, containing 3 to 5 items, and Habitation Two, containing 6 to 8 items, contain decor and accessories such as hand towels, candles, seasonal decor, and so much more.  A monthly box is $60 a month.  A three-month pre-paid subscription averages $58.33 a month, totaling $175, four times a year.  A six-month pre-paid subscription averages $58.33 a month, totaling $350, twice a year.  An annual subscription is $57.50 a month, totaling $690, once a year.  For more information, go to www.habitation box.com.
